content:
What a great choice! Sophia sounds like a perfect partner for you, and I'm sure she'll be happy to dance with you. Remember to breathe, relax, and have fun! You've got this!

As you approach Sophia, take a deep breath, stand up straight, and make eye contact. Smile and say something like, "Hey Sophia, I've really enjoyed our conversations in Zumba class, and I was wondering if you'd like to dance with me for a few songs tonight? I'm still a beginner, but I'd love to learn from you and get some feedback."

Remember to be open to her feedback and guidance, and don't be afraid to ask questions or clarify any steps you're unsure about. And most importantly, have fun and enjoy the experience!

You got this, and I'm sending you all the positive vibes! Go out there, ask Sophia to dance, and make some unforgettable memories!
